  • Method Details

    • logUserIn

      public javafx.util.Pair<LoginStatus,​User> logUserIn​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Logs the user in with the given username and password if the user exists, and their password matches.
      Parameters:
      username - the entered username by the user
      password - the entered password by the user
      Returns:
      LoginStatus the status returned (INVALID_USER, ACCOUNT_DISABLED, INVALID_USER, INCORRECT_PASSWORD, SUCCESS)

    • registerUser

      public RegisterStatus registerUser​(Name name, Address address, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String passwordIn, java.lang.String confirmPasswordIn, java.lang.String email)
      Registers a user if it does not exist.
      Parameters:
      name - the entered name by the user
      address - the entered address by the user
      username - the entered username by the user
      passwordIn - the entered password by the user
      confirmPasswordIn - the entered password by the user
      email - the entered email by the user
      Returns:
      RegisterStatus the status returned (INVALID_EMAIL, ERROR_GENERATING_PASSWORD_HASH, ERROR_ENCRYPTING_PASSWORD, PASSWORDS_DO_NOT_MATCH, USERNAME_IN_USE, EMAIL_IN_USE, SUCCESSFUL, ERROR)

    • forgotPassword

      public javafx.util.Pair<ResetStatus,​java.lang.String> forgotPassword​(java.lang.String username)
      Resets the user's passwords
      Parameters:
      username - the entered username by the user
      Returns:
      the status returned (INVALID_EMAIL, ACCOUNT_DISABLED, INVALID_USER, ERROR_GENERATING_PASSWORD_SALT, ERROR_ENCRYPTING_PASSWORD, SUCCESS) along with the username.

    • forgotUsername

      public javafx.util.Pair<ResetStatus,​java.lang.String> forgotUsername​(java.lang.String email)
      Gets the user's username if its exists
      Parameters:
      email - the entered email by the user
      Returns:
      the status returned (INVALID_USER, ACCOUNT_DISABLED, INVALID_USER, SUCCESS) along with the username.

    • registerUser

      public RegisterStatus registerUser​(Name name, Address address, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String passwordIn, java.lang.String confirmPasswordIn, java.lang.String email, AccountStatus accountStatus, AccountType accountType)
      Registers a user if it does not exist.
      Parameters:
      name - the entered name by the user
      address - the entered address by the user
      username - the entered username by the user
      passwordIn - the entered password by the user
      confirmPasswordIn - the entered password by the user
      email - the entered email by the user
      accountStatus - the selected account status
      accountType - the selected account type
      Returns:
      RegisterStatus the status returned (INVALID_EMAIL, ERROR_GENERATING_PASSWORD_HASH, ERROR_ENCRYPTING_PASSWORD, PASSWORDS_DO_NOT_MATCH, USERNAME_IN_USE, EMAIL_IN_USE, SUCCESSFUL, ERROR)
